mainText:
I am not a longtime Mac user. Steve jobs not only convinced me to 
switch, but he convinced me to pursue my passion in life. And to share 
that passion. Now his death (at my own age) will push me to not lose 
time, but pursue it day by day. I am grateful that he has touched my 
life and the lives of so many people throughout the country and the 
world.
author: Jim
